title: It's pretty ridiculous that I suffer a dodge penalty because a problem with the client
body: The rune pages glitch out when you try to create a new one. Then you can't create a rune page at all so I gotta dodge because my champion wouldn't be viable without specific runes...

replies.body: Their needs to be a way to dispute a dodge penalty when your  client loaded right into the end game screen that was saying I was AFK. Now I'm supposed to wait 9 min to play my first game of the day screw that.

And ONCE again your Client or Server shit out and loaded me into the END game screen and once again I'm  in the Leave buster FOR NO REASON I sat at the game loading screen no one load % moved from zero then bang jumps into END GAME you left or quit your fucked again enjoy your bullshit leave buster and 20 min wait times I have reported my second BUG report but I'm sure you don't give a shit about that as well because I never hear back from anyone I work 50 hrs a week have 2 small kids I hardly get to play as it is  I'm sure as shit not waiting 20 fucking min of time I don't have to play when you screwed up

That is definitely a bug that's happening for some, but you can absolutely still choose a champion and play. Sure, it'd be a little awkward using a rune page that's less than optimal, but that doesn't mean you *have* to dodge. On the topic of that rune page selection bug goes, please make sure to post something about it over in Report a Bug to draw more attention from the devs to get that looked into.
